strings.Value: {n}Stefano Moskoni is wearing particularly splendid attire for his visit. His doublet is embroidered with precious stones, and decorated with the emblem of {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. A disdainful smile is plastered on his powdered face. He bows formally.{/n} "Your Highness! I am here on behalf of His Highness Irovetti of Pitax."
{n}Your guards disarm the screaming Moskoni and drag him away.{/n}

{n}The man who enters the throne room apparently spends a great deal of time and effort on his appearance. His face is powdered, his hair and foppish mustache are generously slicked, and his doublet is embroidered with precious stones and decorated with the emblem of {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. He bows formally.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself. I am Stefano Moskoni, ambassador of His Royal Highness Irovetti of Pitax."
{n}Moskoni smiles contentedly.{/n} "This is slander, Your Highness. My King is famous for his wisdom and fairness. â€“ How could he have woven such a plot?! It is beyond belief!"
{n}With a low bow, Moskoni leaves the throne room.{/n}
